sentence.content: Coal miners in Siberia ended their strike today after exacting promises of better food, housing and working conditions, but the wave of unrest they launched continued in other key coal regions.

sentence.content: Gorbachev is trying to end the longtime Soviet practice of setting prices for goods that bear no relation to their free-market value and encourage and end to central control of the economy.
